get.description: Returns the list of all alerts in a given region.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Subscription credentials that uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

Alert.description: This object represents an alert resource.

location.description: The Azure Region where the resource lives

allOf.description: The resource model definition for a ARM tracked top level resource

id.description: Fully qualified resource Id for the resource

allOf.description: The core properties of ARM resources

alertId.description: Gets or sets the ID of the alert.

closedByUserAlias.description: User alias who closed the alert.

closedTimestamp.description: Timestamp when the alert was closed.

createdTimestamp.description: Timestamp when the alert was created.

faultId.description: Gets or sets the fault ID of the alert.

faultTypeId.description: Gets or sets the fault type ID of the alert.

hasValidRemediationAction.description: Indicates if the alert can be remediated.

impactedResourceDisplayName.description: Display name for the impacted item.

impactedResourceId.description: Gets or sets the Resource ID for the impacted item.

lastUpdatedTimestamp.description: Timestamp when the alert was last updated.

remediation.description: Gets or sets the admin friendly remediation instructions for the alert.

resourceProviderRegistrationId.description: Gets or sets the registration ID of the service the alert belongs to.

resourceRegistrationId.description: Gets or sets the registration ID of the resource associated with the alert. If the alert is not associated with a resource, the resource registration ID is null.

title.description: Gets or sets the Resource ID for the impacted item.

UserParameter.name: user
UserParameter.description: The username used to perform the operation.

azure_auth.description: Authorization uses an Azure Active Directory OAuth2 flow.
